verses.name: Acts 10:37
verses.text: That word, I say, ye know, which was published throughout all Judea, and began from Galilee, after the baptism which John preached;

verses.name: Acts 10:38
verses.text: How God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Ghost and with power: who went about doing good, and healing all that were oppressed of the devil; for God was with him.

verses.name: Acts 10:39
verses.text: And we are witnesses of all things which he did both in the land of the Jews, and in Jerusalem; whom they slew and hanged on a tree:

verses.name: Acts 10:40
verses.text: Him God raised up the third day, and shewed him openly;
